game.name: F*ck the HELL out
game.shortDescription: 지옥을 엿먹여라는 무한한 우주에 퍼진 지옥의 해충을 정화하는 탑다운 액션 슈팅 게임입니다. 두개골을 박살내고 영혼을 파괴하며 무한한 우주 전투에서 당신의 무기고로 지배하십시오.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Fuck the Hell Out is a top-down action shooter where you purge the vast cosmos of hellish pests. Crush their skulls, shatter their spirits, and dominate with your arsenal in endless space battles.

reviewHighlights.text: This fast and dynamic game is very interesting to me for a small discount price in which it is very nice to smash opponents in the arena, the game is...
This game is a chaotic mess. The controls are unresponsive, the graphics are outdated, and the gameplay is monotonous. It quickly becomes frustrating...
